verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> unto Joshua אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> Fear וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּחָ֔ת <WH2865> not neither be thou dismayed קַ֣ח <WH3947> take עִמְּךָ֗ <WH5973> with אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַ֣ם <WH5971> all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> of war וְק֖וּם <WH6965> with thee and arise עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> go up הָעָ֑י <WH5857> to Ai רְאֵ֣ה ׀ <WH7200> see נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> I have given בְיָדְךָ֗ <WH3027> into thy hand אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הָעַי֙ <WH5857> of Ai וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> and his people וְאֶת־ <WH853> עִיר֖וֹ <WH5892> and his city וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> and his land

וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt do לָעַ֜י <WH5857> to Ai וּלְמַלְכָּ֗הּ <WH4428> and her king כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you עָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> as thou didst לִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <WH3405> unto Jericho וּלְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <WH4428> and her king רַק־ <WH7535> its שְׁלָלָ֥הּ <WH7998> only the spoil וּבְהֶמְתָּ֖הּ <WH929> thereof and the cattle תָּבֹ֣זּוּ <WH962> thereof shall ye take for a prey לָכֶ֑ם שִׂים־ <WH7760> unto yourselves lay לְךָ֥ אֹרֵ֛ב <WH693> thee an ambush לָעִ֖יר <WH5892> for the city מֵאַחֲרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH310> behind

וַיָּ֧קָם <WH6965> arose יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> So Joshua וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עַ֥ם <WH5971> and all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> of war לַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> to go up הָעָ֑י <WH5857> against Ai וַיִּבְחַ֣ר <WH977> chose out יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <WH3091> and Joshua שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> thirty אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> thousand אִישׁ֙ <WH376> men גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <WH1368> mighty הַחַ֔יִל <WH2428> of valour וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֖ם <WH7971> and sent them away לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> by night

וַיְצַ֨ו <WH6680> And he commanded אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> them saying רְ֠אוּ <WH7200> Behold אַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> you אֹרְבִ֤ים <WH693> ye shall lie in wait לָעִיר֙ <WH5892> against the city מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> [even] behind הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> the city אַל־ <WH408> not תַּרְחִ֥יקוּ <WH7368> far מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> from the city מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> not very וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <WH1961> become כֻּלְּכֶ֖ם <WH3605> all נְכֹנִֽים׃ <WH3559> but be ye all ready

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And I and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתִּ֔י <WH854> for נִקְרַ֖ב <WH7126> that [are] with me will approach אֶל־ <WH413> about הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> unto the city וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> and when יֵצְא֤וּ <WH3318> and it shall come to pass when they come out לִקְרָאתֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH7125> against כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֔ה <WH7223> us as at the first וְנַ֖סְנוּ <WH5127> that we will flee לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

וְיָצְא֣וּ <WH3318> (For they will come out אַחֲרֵ֗ינוּ <WH310> after עַ֣ד <WH5704> until הַתִּיקֵ֤נוּ <WH5423> us) till we have drawn אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> them from the city כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <WH559> for they will say נָסִ֣ים <WH5127> They flee לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <WH6440> before כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> us בָּרִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> us as at the first וְנַ֖סְנוּ <WH5127> therefore we will flee לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> and you תָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <WH6965> Then ye shall rise up מֵהָ֣אוֹרֵ֔ב <WH693> from the ambush וְהוֹרַשְׁתֶּ֖ם <WH3423> and seize אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> upon the city וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <WH5414> will deliver יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> it into your hand

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become כְּתָפְשְׂכֶ֣ם <WH8610> And it shall be when ye have taken אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> the city תַּצִּ֤יתוּ <WH3341> [that] ye shall set אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> the city בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> on fire כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> shall ye do רְא֖וּ <WH7200> See צִוִּ֥יתִי <WH6680> I have commanded אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֣ם <WH7971> therefore sent them forth יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> Joshua וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> went אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמַּאְרָ֔ב <WH3993> to lie in ambush וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <WH3427> and abode בֵּ֧ין <WH996> between בֵּֽית־ אֵ֛ל <WH1008> between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הָעַ֖י <WH5857> and Ai מִיָּ֣ם <WH3220> on the west side לָעָ֑י <WH5857> of Ai וַיָּ֧לֶן <WH3885> lodged יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> but Joshua בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> that night הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֤ם <WH7925> rose up early יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> And Joshua בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּפְקֹ֖ד <WH6485> and numbered אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> and went up ה֜וּא <WH1931> he וְזִקְנֵ֧י <WH2205> he and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people הָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> to Ai

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> And all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <WH4421> [even the people] of war אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for עָלוּ֙ <WH5927> that [were] with him went up וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֔וּ <WH5066> and drew nigh וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> front הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> before the city וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and pitched מִצְּפ֣וֹן <WH6828> on the north side לָעַ֔י <WH5857> of Ai וְהַגַּ֖י <WH1516> now [there was] a valley [בֵּינֹו כ] (בֵּינָ֥יו <WH996> between ק) וּבֵין־ <WH996> between הָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> between them and Ai

וַיִּקַּ֕ח <WH3947> And he took כַּחֲמֵ֥שֶׁת <WH2568> about five אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> and set אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> אֹרֵ֗ב <WH693> them to lie in ambush בֵּ֧ין <WH996> between בֵּֽית־ אֵ֛ל <WH1008> between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הָעַ֖י <WH5857> and Ai מִיָּ֥ם <WH3220> on the west side לָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city

וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <WH7760> And when they had set הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> the people אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <WH4264> [even] all the host אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> that was מִצְּפ֣וֹן <WH6828> that [was] on the north לָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲקֵב֖וֹ <WH6119> and their liers in wait מִיָּ֣ם <WH3220> on the west לָעִ֑יר <WH5892> of the city וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> spent יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> Joshua בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> that night הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> into the midst הָעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> of the valley

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came כִּרְא֣וֹת <WH7200> saw מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And it came to pass when the king הָעַ֗י <WH5857> of Ai וַֽיְמַהֲר֡וּ <WH4116> [it] that they hasted וַיַּשְׁכִּ֡ימוּ <WH7925> and rose up early וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <WH3318> went out אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH582> and the men הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> of the city לִקְרַֽאת־ <WH7125> against יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Israel לַֽמִּלְחָמָ֞ה <WH4421> to battle ה֧וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עַמּ֛וֹ <WH5971> he and all his people לַמּוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> at a time appointed לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָֽעֲרָבָ֑ה <WH6160> the plain וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יָדַ֔ע <WH3045> but he wist כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֹרֵ֥ב <WH693> not that [there were] liers in ambush ל֖וֹ מֵאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> against him behind הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

וַיִּנָּֽגְע֛וּ <WH5060> made as if they were beaten יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <WH3091> And Joshua וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and all Israel לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> before וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <WH5127> them and fled דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> of the wilderness

וַיִּזָּעֲק֗וּ <WH2199> were called כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who [בָּעִיר כ] (בָּעַ֔י <WH5892> the city ק) לִרְדֹּ֖ף <WH7291> together to pursue אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> after וַֽיִּרְדְּפוּ֙ <WH7291> them and they pursued אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> Joshua וַיִּנָּתְק֖וּ <WH5423> and were drawn away מִן־ <WH4480> were in הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> from the city

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נִשְׁאַ֣ר <WH7604> left אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And there was not a man בָּעַי֙ <WH5857> in Ai וּבֵ֣ית אֵ֔ל <WH1008> or Bethel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not יָצְא֖וּ <WH3318> that went not out אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַיַּעַזְב֤וּ <WH5800> and they left אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> the city פְּתוּחָ֔ה <WH6605> open וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <WH7291> and pursued אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> after Israel פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> toward יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua נְ֠טֵה <WH5186> Stretch out בַּכִּיד֤וֹן <WH3591> the spear אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> is in בְּיָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> that [is] in thy hand אֶל־ <WH413> toward הָעַ֔י <WH5857> toward Ai כִּ֥י <WH3588> into בְיָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> it into thine hand אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה <WH5414> for I will give וַיֵּ֧ט <WH5186> stretched out יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בַּכִּיד֥וֹן <WH3591> the spear אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that was בְּיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> that [he had] in his hand אֶל־ <WH413> toward הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> toward the city

וְהָאוֹרֵ֡ב <WH693> And the ambush קָם֩ <WH6965> arose מְהֵרָ֨ה <WH4120> quickly מִמְּקוֹמ֤וֹ <WH4725> out of their place וַיָּר֙וּצוּ֙ <WH7323> and they ran כִּנְט֣וֹת <WH5186> as soon as he had stretched out יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> his hand וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> and they entered הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> into the city וַֽיִּלְכְּד֑וּהָ <WH3920> and took וַֽיְמַהֲר֔וּ <WH4116> it and hasted וַיַּצִּ֥יתוּ <WH3341> and set אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> on fire

וַיִּפְנ֣וּ <WH6437> looked אַנְשֵׁי֩ <WH376> the men הָעַ֨י <WH5857> of Ai אַחֲרֵיהֶ֜ם <WH310> behind וַיִּרְא֗וּ <WH7200> them they saw וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold עָלָ֜ה <WH5927> ascended up עֲשַׁ֤ן <WH6227> and behold the smoke הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city הַשָּׁמַ֔יְמָה <WH8064> to heaven וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> had בָהֶ֥ם יָדַ֛יִם <WH3027> and they had no power לָנ֖וּס <WH5127> to flee הֵ֣נָּה <WH2008> this way or that way וָהֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> way וְהָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people הַנָּ֣ס <WH5127> that fled הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> to the wilderness נֶהְפַּ֖ךְ <WH2015> turned back אֶל־ <WH413> against הָרוֹדֵֽף׃ <WH7291> upon the pursuers

וִיהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <WH3091> And when Joshua וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> and all Israel רָא֗וּ <WH7200> saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לָכַ֤ד <WH3920> had taken הָֽאֹרֵב֙ <WH693> that the ambush אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> the city וְכִ֥י <WH3588> for עָלָ֖ה <WH5927> ascended עֲשַׁ֣ן <WH6227> and that the smoke הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> of the city וַיָּשֻׁ֕בוּ <WH7725> then they turned again וַיַּכּ֖וּ <WH5221> and slew אֶת־ <WH853> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> the men הָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> of Ai

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> And the other יָצְא֤וּ <WH3318> issued out מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <WH7125> against וַיִּֽהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel בַּתָּ֔וֶךְ <WH8432> them so they were in the midst אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> some מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> and some מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> side וַיַּכּ֣וּ <WH5221> some on this side and some on that side and they smote אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> עַד־ <WH5704> them so that בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <WH7604> they let ל֖וֹ שָׂרִ֥יד <WH8300> none of them remain וּפָלִֽיט׃ <WH6412> or escape

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king הָעַ֖י <WH5857> of Ai תָּ֣פְשׂוּ <WH8610> they took חָ֑י <WH2416> alive וַיַּקְרִ֥בוּ <WH7126> and brought אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <WH3091> him to Joshua
